name: CupertinoSearchTextField
desc: A [CupertinoTextField] that mimics the look and behavior of UIKit's `UISearchTextField`.

fields.name: style
fields.desc: Allows changing the style of the text.

fields.name: placeholder
fields.desc: A hint placeholder text that appears when the text entry is empty.

fields.name: placeholderStyle
fields.desc: Sets the style of the placeholder of the text field.

fields.name: decoration
fields.desc: Sets the decoration for the text field.

fields.name: keyboardType
fields.desc: The keyboard type for this search field.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: Sets the padding insets for the text and placeholder.

fields.name: itemColor
fields.desc: Sets the color for the suffix and prefix icons.

fields.name: itemSize
fields.desc: Sets the base icon size for the suffix and prefix icons.

fields.name: prefixInsets
fields.desc: Sets the padding insets for the suffix.

fields.name: suffixInsets
fields.desc: Sets the padding insets for the prefix.

fields.name: suffixMode
fields.desc: Dictates when the X-Mark (suffix) should be visible.

fields.name: smartQuotesType
fields.desc: Whether to allow the platform to automatically format quotes.

fields.name: smartDashesType
fields.desc: Whether to allow the platform to automatically format dashes.

fields.name: enabled
fields.desc: Disables the text field when false.

fields.name: cursorColor
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the cursor.
